masterGrammar.rule: rule {IP option conj - conjoined IPs} IP = (InitConj) IP_1 Conj IP_2 <IP head> = <IP_2 head> <Conj head type conjoins_IP> = + <IP conjoined> = + <IP_1 conjoined> = - |limit recursion <IP head type prefix> <= <IP_1 head type prefix> <IP option> = conj

rule {IP option conjPrefix - conjoined IPs} IP = IP_1 IP_2 <IP head> = <IP_2 head> <IP conjoined> = + <IP_1 conjoined> = - |limit recursion <IP_2 head type prefix conj> = + <IP head type prefix> <= <IP_1 head type prefix> <IP option> = conjPrefix

rule {IP option conjSuffix - conjoined IPs} IP = IP_1 IP_2 <IP head> = <IP_2 head> <IP conjoined> = + <IP_1 conjoined> = - |limit recursion <IP_1 head type suffix conj> = + <IP head type prefix> <= <IP_1 head type prefix> <IP option> = conjSuffix

rule {IP option conjNone - conjoined IPs} IP = IP_1 IP_2 <IP head> = <IP_2 head> <IP conjoined> = + <IP_1 conjoined> = - |limit recursion <IP_2 head type prefix conj> = - <IP_1 head type suffix conj> = - <IP_1 head type comma> = - <IP head type prefix> <= <IP_1 head type prefix> <IP option> = conjNone
rule {IP option 1a - no subject for imperatives} IP = I' <IP head> = <I' head> <I' head infl mood> = imperative <IP head type question> = - <IP option> = 1a

rule {IP option 1b - subject pro-drop, not passive} IP = I' <IP head> = <I' head> <IP head type pro-drop> = + <IP head infl mood> = imperative {<I' head type transitive> = - /<I' head type transitive> = + <I' head object head type reflexive> = - /<I' head type transitive> = + <I' head object head type reflexive> = + <I' head subject head agr> = <I' head object head agr> } <IP head infl valence> = active <IP head> == [type:[reciprocal:+]] -> [subject:[head:[agr:[number:plural]]]] <IP head> == [object:[head:[type:[reciprocal:+]]]] -> [subject:[head:[agr:[number:plural]]]] <IP head fronted> == ~[cat:DP] <IP option> = 1b

rule {IP option 1c - subject pro-drop, passive} IP = I' <IP head> = <I' head> <IP head type pro-drop> = + <IP head infl mood> = imperative <IP head infl valence> = passive <IP head fronted> == ~[cat:DP] <IP option> = 1c

rule {IP option 1exist - subject missing for existentials without an existential Adv} IP = I' <IP head> = <I' head> <IP head type existential> = + <IP head type verbheaded> = + | if no existential verb, then existential Adv required <IP head infl mood> = declarative <IP head infl valence> = active <IP head fronted> == ~[cat:DP] <IP option> = 1exist

rule {IP option 2a - subject initial, required, not passive or antipassive} IP = DP I' <IP head> = <I' head> <IP head type pro-drop> = - <I' head subject> = <DP> {<I' head type transitive> = - /<I' head type transitive> = + <I' head object head type reflexive> = - /<I' head type transitive> = + <I' head object head type reflexive> = + <DP head agr> = <I' head object head agr> } <DP head type wh> = - <DP head type possessive> = - |subject not possessive <DP head type reflexive> = - |subject not reflexive <DP head type reciprocal> = - |subject not reciprocal <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <DP head type comma> = - <IP head type prefix> <= <DP head type prefix> <I' head infl polarity> <= <DP head infl polarity> <IP head> == [type:[reciprocal:+]] -> [subject:[head:[agr:[number:plural]]]] <IP head> == [object:[head:[type:[reciprocal:+]]]] -> [subject:[head:[agr:[number:plural]]]] <IP head infl> == ~[valence:passive] <IP head infl> == ~[valence:antipassive] <IP option> = 2a

rule {IP option 2aNegVerb - subject initial, not passive or antipassive, neg subj requires neg verb} IP = DP I' <IP head> = <I' head> <IP head type pro-drop> = - <I' head subject> = <DP> {<I' head type transitive> = - /<I' head type transitive> = + <I' head object head type reflexive> = - /<I' head type transitive> = + <I' head object head type reflexive> = + <DP head agr> = <I' head object head agr> } <DP head type wh> = - <DP head type possessive> = - |subject not possessive <DP head type reflexive> = - |subject not reflexive <DP head type reciprocal> = - |subject not reciprocal <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <IP head type prefix> <= <DP head type prefix> <DP head type comma> = - <IP head> == [type:[reciprocal:+]] -> [subject:[head:[agr:[number:plural]]]] <IP head> == [object:[head:[type:[reciprocal:+]]]] -> [subject:[head:[agr:[number:plural]]]] <I' head> == [subject:[head:[infl:[polarity:negative]]]] -> | if subject negative, verb must be [infl:[polarity:negative]] <IP head infl> == ~[valence:passive] <IP head infl> == ~[valence:antipassive] <IP option> = 2aNegVerb

rule {IP option 2b - subject initial, required, passive} IP = DP I' <IP head> = <I' head> <IP head type pro-drop> = - <I' head object> = <DP> <DP head type wh> = - <IP head infl valence> = passive <DP head type possessive> = - |subject not possessive <DP head type reflexive> = - |subject not reflexive <DP head type reciprocal> = - |subject not reciprocal <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <DP head type comma> = - <IP head type prefix> <= <DP head type prefix> <I' head infl polarity> <= <DP head infl polarity> <IP option> = 2b

rule {IP option 2bNegVerb - subject initial, required, passive, neg subj requires neg verb} IP = DP I' <IP head> = <I' head> <IP head type pro-drop> = - <I' head object> = <DP> <DP head type wh> = - <IP head infl valence> = passive <DP head type possessive> = - |subject not possessive <DP head type reflexive> = - |subject not reflexive <DP head type reciprocal> = - |subject not reciprocal <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <DP head type comma> = - <IP head type prefix> <= <DP head type prefix> <I' head> == [subject:[head:[infl:[polarity:negative]]]] -> | if subject negative, verb must be [infl:[polarity:negative]] <IP option> = 2bNegVerb

rule {IP option 2bantiNotErg - subject initial, required, antipassive, not ergative} IP = DP I' <IP head> = <I' head> <IP head type pro-drop> = - <I' head subject> = <DP> <I' head infl valence> = antipassive <DP head case> = nominative <DP head type wh> = - <DP head type possessive> = - |subject not possessive <DP head type reflexive> = - |subject not reflexive <DP head type reciprocal> = - |subject not reciprocal <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <DP head type comma> = - <IP head type prefix> <= <DP head type prefix> <I' head infl polarity> <= <DP head infl polarity> <IP head> == [type:[reciprocal:+]] -> [subject:[head:[agr:[number:plural]]]] <IP option> = 2bantiNotErg

rule {IP option 2bantiNotErgNegV - subject initial, required, antipassive, not ergative, neg V requires neg Subj} IP = DP I' <IP head> = <I' head> <IP head type pro-drop> = - <I' head subject> = <DP> <I' head infl valence> = antipassive <DP head case> = nominative <DP head type wh> = - <DP head type possessive> = - |subject not possessive <DP head type reflexive> = - |subject not reflexive <DP head type reciprocal> = - |subject not reciprocal <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <DP head type comma> = - <IP head type prefix> <= <DP head type prefix> <I' head> == [subject:[head:[infl:[polarity:negative]]]] -> | if subject negative, verb must be [infl:[polarity:negative]] <IP head> == [type:[reciprocal:+]] -> [subject:[head:[agr:[number:plural]]]] <IP option> = 2bantiNotErgNegV

rule {IP option 2bantiErg - subject initial, required, antipassive, ergative} IP = DP I' <IP head> = <I' head> <IP head type pro-drop> = - <I' head subject> = <DP> <I' head infl valence> = antipassive <DP head case> = absolutive <DP head type wh> = - <DP head type possessive> = - |subject not possessive <DP head type reflexive> = - |subject not reflexive <DP head type reciprocal> = - |subject not reciprocal <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <DP head type comma> = - <IP head type prefix> <= <DP head type prefix> <I' head infl polarity> <= <DP head infl polarity> <IP head> == [type:[reciprocal:+]] -> [subject:[head:[agr:[number:plural]]]] <IP option> = 2bantiErg

rule {IP option 2bantiErgNegV - subject initial, required, antipassive, ergative, neg V requires neg Subj} IP = DP I' <IP head> = <I' head> <IP head type pro-drop> = - <I' head subject> = <DP> <I' head infl valence> = antipassive <DP head case> = absolutive <DP head type wh> = - <DP head type possessive> = - |subject not possessive <DP head type reflexive> = - |subject not reflexive <DP head type reciprocal> = - |subject not reciprocal <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <DP head type comma> = - <IP head type prefix> <= <DP head type prefix> <I' head> == [subject:[head:[infl:[polarity:negative]]]] -> | if subject negative, verb must be [infl:[polarity:negative]] <IP head> == [type:[reciprocal:+]] -> [subject:[head:[agr:[number:plural]]]] <IP option> = 2bantiErgNegV

rule {IP option 2c - subject final, required, not passive} IP = I' DP <IP head> = <I' head> <IP head type pro-drop> = - <I' head subject> = <DP> {<I' head type transitive> = - /<I' head type transitive> = + <I' head object head type reflexive> = - /<I' head type transitive> = + <I' head object head type reflexive> = + <DP head agr> = <I' head object head agr> } <DP head type wh> = - <DP head type possessive> = - |subject not possessive <DP head type reflexive> = - |subject not reflexive <DP head type reciprocal> = - |subject not reciprocal <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <I' head type comma> = - <IP head type comma> <= <DP head type comma> <IP head type suffix> <= <DP head type suffix> <I' head infl polarity> <= <DP head infl polarity> <IP head> == [type:[reciprocal:+]] -> [subject:[head:[agr:[number:plural]]]] <IP head> == [object:[head:[type:[reciprocal:+]]]] -> [subject:[head:[agr:[number:plural]]]] <IP head infl> == ~[valence:passive] <IP option> = 2c

rule {IP option 2cNegVerb - subject final, required, not passive, neg requires neg verb} IP = I' DP <IP head> = <I' head> <IP head type pro-drop> = - <I' head subject> = <DP> {<I' head type transitive> = - /<I' head type transitive> = + <I' head object head type reflexive> = - /<I' head type transitive> = + <I' head object head type reflexive> = + <DP head agr> = <I' head object head agr> } <DP head type wh> = - <DP head type possessive> = - |subject not possessive <DP head type reflexive> = - |subject not reflexive <DP head type reciprocal> = - |subject not reciprocal <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <I' head type comma> = - <IP head type comma> <= <DP head type comma> <IP head type suffix> <= <DP head type suffix> <IP head> == [type:[reciprocal:+]] -> [subject:[head:[agr:[number:plural]]]] <IP head> == [object:[head:[type:[reciprocal:+]]]] -> [subject:[head:[agr:[number:plural]]]] <I' head> == [subject:[head:[infl:[polarity:negative]]]] -> | if subject negative, verb must be [infl:[polarity:negative]] <IP head infl> == ~[valence:passive] <IP option> = 2cNegVerb

rule {IP option 2d - subject final, required, passive} IP = I' DP <IP head> = <I' head> <IP head type pro-drop> = - <I' head object> = <DP> <DP head type wh> = - <IP head infl valence> = passive <DP head type possessive> = - |subject not possessive <DP head type reflexive> = - |subject not reflexive <DP head type reciprocal> = - |subject not reciprocal <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <I' head type comma> = - <IP head type comma> <= <DP head type comma> <IP head type suffix> <= <DP head type suffix> <I' head infl polarity> <= <DP head infl polarity> <IP option> = 2d

rule {IP option 2dNegVerb - subject final, required, passive, neg requires neg verb} IP = I' DP <IP head> = <I' head> <IP head type pro-drop> = - <I' head object> = <DP> <DP head type wh> = - <IP head infl valence> = passive <DP head type possessive> = - |subject not possessive <DP head type reflexive> = - |subject not reflexive <DP head type reciprocal> = - |subject not reciprocal <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <I' head type comma> = - <IP head type comma> <= <DP head type comma> <IP head type suffix> <= <DP head type suffix> <I' head> == [subject:[head:[infl:[polarity:negative]]]] -> | if subject negative, verb must be [infl:[polarity:negative]] <IP option> = 2dNegVerb

rule {IP option 2dantiNotErg - subject final, required, antipassive, not ergative} IP = I' DP <IP head> = <I' head> <IP head type pro-drop> = - <I' head subject> = <DP> <I' head infl valence> = antipassive <DP head case> = nominative <DP head type wh> = - <DP head type possessive> = - |subject not possessive <DP head type reflexive> = - |subject not reflexive <DP head type reciprocal> = - |subject not reciprocal <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <I' head type comma> = - <IP head type suffix> <= <DP head type suffix> <I' head infl polarity> <= <DP head infl polarity> <IP head> == [type:[reciprocal:+]] -> [subject:[head:[agr:[number:plural]]]] <IP option> = 2dantiNotErg

rule {IP option 2dantiNotErgNegV - subject final, required, antipassive, not ergative, neg V requires neg Subj} IP = I' DP <IP head> = <I' head> <IP head type pro-drop> = - <I' head subject> = <DP> <I' head infl valence> = antipassive <DP head case> = nominative <DP head type wh> = - <DP head type possessive> = - |subject not possessive <DP head type reflexive> = - |subject not reflexive <DP head type reciprocal> = - |subject not reciprocal <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <I' head type comma> = - <IP head type suffix> <= <DP head type suffix> <I' head> == [subject:[head:[infl:[polarity:negative]]]] -> | if subject negative, verb must be [infl:[polarity:negative]] <IP head> == [type:[reciprocal:+]] -> [subject:[head:[agr:[number:plural]]]] <IP option> = 2dantiNotErgNegV

rule {IP option 2dantiErg - subject final, required, antipassive, ergative} IP = I' DP <IP head> = <I' head> <IP head type pro-drop> = - <I' head subject> = <DP> <I' head infl valence> = antipassive <DP head case> = absolutive <DP head type wh> = - <DP head type possessive> = - |subject not possessive <DP head type reflexive> = - |subject not reflexive <DP head type reciprocal> = - |subject not reciprocal <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <I' head type comma> = - <IP head type suffix> <= <DP head type suffix> <I' head infl polarity> <= <DP head infl polarity> <IP head> == [type:[reciprocal:+]] -> [subject:[head:[agr:[number:plural]]]] <IP option> = 2dantiErg

rule {IP option 2dantiErgNegV - subject final, required, antipassive, ergative, neg V requires neg Subj} IP = I' DP <IP head> = <I' head> <IP head type pro-drop> = - <I' head subject> = <DP> <I' head infl valence> = antipassive <DP head case> = absolutive <DP head type wh> = - <DP head type possessive> = - |subject not possessive <DP head type reflexive> = - |subject not reflexive <DP head type reciprocal> = - |subject not reciprocal <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <I' head type comma> = - <IP head type suffix> <= <DP head type suffix> <I' head> == [subject:[head:[infl:[polarity:negative]]]] -> | if subject negative, verb must be [infl:[polarity:negative]] <IP head> == [type:[reciprocal:+]] -> [subject:[head:[agr:[number:plural]]]] <IP option> = 2dantiErgNegV
rule {IP option 3 - subject internal to VP for VSO, OSV} IP = I' <IP head> = <I' head> <IP option> = 3

rule {IP option 3aexist - existential Adv initial} IP = AdvP I' <IP head> = <I' head> <IP head type existential> = + <AdvP head type existential> = + <IP head infl valence> = active <AdvP head type comma> = - <IP head type prefix> <= <AdvP head type prefix> <IP option> = 3aexist

rule {IP option 3bexist - existential Adv final} IP = I' AdvP <IP head> = <I' head> <IP head type existential> = + <AdvP head type existential> = + <IP head infl valence> = active <I' head type comma> = - <IP head type comma> <= <AdvP head type comma> <IP head type suffix> <= <AdvP head type suffix> <IP option> = 3bexist

rule {IP option 4a - subject questioned, not passive} IP = I' <IP head> = <I' head> <IP head type question> = + <IP head type pro-drop> = - <IP head fronted cat> = DP <IP head fronted head type wh> = + <IP head fronted> = <I' head subject> {<I' head type transitive> = - /<I' head type transitive> = + <I' head object head type reflexive> = - /<I' head type transitive> = + <I' head object head type reflexive> = + <IP head fronted> = <I' head object> } <IP head infl> == ~[valence:passive] <IP option> = 4a

rule {IP option 4afoc - subject focused, not passive} IP = I' <IP head> = <I' head> <IP head type question> = - <IP head type pro-drop> = - <IP head fronted cat> = FocusP <IP head fronted head type wh> = - <IP head fronted> = <I' head subject> {<I' head type transitive> = - /<I' head type transitive> = + <I' head object head type reflexive> = - /<I' head type transitive> = + <I' head object head type reflexive> = + <IP head fronted> = <I' head object> } <IP head infl> == ~[valence:passive] <IP option> = 4afoc

rule {IP option 4aSOV - subject questioned, not passive, SOV} IP = I' <IP head> = <I' head> <IP head type question> = + <IP head type pro-drop> = - <IP head infl> == ~[valence:passive] <IP option> = 4aSOV

rule {IP option 4b - subject questioned, passive} IP = I' <IP head> = <I' head> <IP head type question> = + <IP head type pro-drop> = - <IP head infl valence> = passive <IP head fronted cat> = DP <IP head fronted head type wh> = + <IP head fronted> = <I' head object> <IP option> = 4b

rule {IP option 4b - subject focused, passive} IP = I' <IP head> = <I' head> <IP head type question> = - <IP head type pro-drop> = - <IP head infl valence> = passive <IP head fronted cat> = FocusP <IP head fronted head type wh> = - <IP head fronted> = <I' head object> <IP option> = 4bfoc
rule {IP option 4bSOV - subject questioned, passive, SOV} IP = I' <IP head> = <I' head> <IP head type question> = + <IP head type pro-drop> = - <IP head infl valence> = passive <IP option> = 4bSOV

rule {IP option 5 - adverb questioned, copular verb} IP = I' <IP head> = <I' head> <IP head type question> = + <IP head fronted cat> = AdvP <IP head fronted head type wh> = + <I' head type copular> = + <I' head type transitive> = - <IP head infl> == ~[valence:passive] <IP option> = 5
rule {IBar option 1 - no auxiliaries} I' = VP <I' head> = <VP head> {<I' head type auxiliary> = - <I' head type question> = - /<I' head type question> = + } <I' option> = 1

rule {IBar option 2 - positive Aux initial, required} I' = Aux VP <I' head> = <VP head> <I' head type auxiliary> = + <Aux head infl polarity> = positive <I' head subject head agr> = <Aux head subject head agr> {<VP head infl finite> = - /<VP head infl finite> = + <Aux head infl tense> = <VP head infl tense> } <Aux head type comma> = - <I' head type prefix> <= <Aux head type prefix> <I' option> = 2

rule {IBar option 2Neg - negative Aux initial, either word or affix, but no other aux required} I' = Aux VP <I' head> = <VP head> <I' head type auxiliary> = + <Aux head infl polarity> = negative <I' head subject head agr> = <Aux head subject head agr> {<VP head infl finite> = - /<VP head infl finite> = + <Aux head infl tense> = <VP head infl tense> } <Aux head type comma> = - <I' head type prefix> <= <Aux head type prefix> <VP head infl polarity> <= <Aux head infl polarity> | polarity from Aux <I' option> = 2Neg

rule {IBar option 2NegAuxVerbRequired - negative Aux initial, either word or affix, but no other aux required} I' = Aux VP <I' head> = <VP head> <I' head type auxiliary> = + <Aux head infl polarity> = negative <VP head infl polarity> = negative | only neg verb with neg Aux <I' head subject head agr> = <Aux head subject head agr> {<VP head infl finite> = - /<VP head infl finite> = + <Aux head infl tense> = <VP head infl tense> } <Aux head type comma> = - <I' head type prefix> <= <Aux head type prefix> <I' option> = 2NegAuxVerbRequired

rule {IBar option 2NegPlusAux - Aux_1 positive then negative Aux, initial} I' = Aux_1 Aux VP <I' head> = <VP head> <I' head type auxiliary> = + <Aux_1 head infl polarity> = positive <Aux head infl polarity> = negative <I' head subject head agr> = <Aux_1 head subject head agr> {<VP head infl finite> = - /<VP head infl finite> = + <Aux_1 head infl tense> = <VP head infl tense> } <Aux head type comma> = - <Aux_1 head type comma> = - <I' head type prefix> <= <Aux_1 head type prefix> <VP head infl polarity> <= <Aux head infl polarity> | polarity from Aux <I' option> = 2NegPlusAux

rule {IBar option 2NegPlusAuxVerbRequired - Aux_1 positive then negative Aux, initial} I' = Aux_1 Aux VP <I' head> = <VP head> <I' head type auxiliary> = + <Aux_1 head infl polarity> = positive <Aux head infl polarity> = negative <VP head infl polarity> = negative | neg Aux requires neg verb <I' head subject head agr> = <Aux_1 head subject head agr> {<VP head infl finite> = - /<VP head infl finite> = + <Aux_1 head infl tense> = <VP head infl tense> } <Aux head type comma> = - <Aux_1 head type comma> = - <I' head type prefix> <= <Aux_1 head type prefix> <I' option> = 2NegPlusAuxVerbRequired

rule {IBar option 3 - positive Aux final, required} I' = VP Aux <I' head> = <VP head> <I' head type auxiliary> = + <Aux head infl polarity> = positive <I' head subject head agr> = <Aux head subject head agr> {<VP head infl finite> = - /<VP head infl finite> = + <Aux head infl tense> = <VP head infl tense> } <VP head type comma> = - <I' head type comma> <= <Aux head type comma> <IP head type suffix> <= <DP head type suffix> <I' option> = 3

rule {IBar option 3Neg - negative Aux final, either word or affix, but no other aux required} I' = VP Aux <I' head> = <VP head> <I' head type auxiliary> = + <Aux head infl polarity> = negative <I' head subject head agr> = <Aux head subject head agr> {<VP head infl finite> = - /<VP head infl finite> = + <Aux head infl tense> = <VP head infl tense> } <VP head type comma> = - <I' head type comma> <= <Aux head type comma> <I' head type suffix> <= <Aux head type suffix> <VP head infl polarity> <= <Aux head infl polarity> | polarity from Aux <I' option> = 3Neg

rule {IBar option 3NegAuxVerbRequired - negative Aux final, either word or affix, but no other aux required} I' = VP Aux <I' head> = <VP head> <I' head type auxiliary> = + <Aux head infl polarity> = negative <VP head infl polarity> = negative | neg Aux requires neg verb <I' head subject head agr> = <Aux head subject head agr> {<VP head infl finite> = - /<VP head infl finite> = + <Aux head infl tense> = <VP head infl tense> } <VP head type comma> = - <I' head type comma> <= <Aux head type comma> <I' head type suffix> <= <Aux head type suffix> <I' option> = 3NegAuxVerbRequired

rule {IBar option 3NegPlusAux - negative Aux then Aux_1 positive, final} I' = VP Aux Aux_1 <I' head> = <VP head> <I' head type auxiliary> = + <Aux_1 head infl polarity> = positive <Aux head infl polarity> = negative <I' head subject head agr> = <Aux_1 head subject head agr> {<VP head infl finite> = - /<VP head infl finite> = + <Aux_1 head infl tense> = <VP head infl tense> } <VP head type comma> = - <Aux head type comma> = - <I' head type comma> <= <Aux_1 head type comma> <I' head type suffix> <= <Aux_1 head type suffix> <VP head infl polarity> <= <Aux head infl polarity> | polarity from Aux <I' option> = 3NegPlusAux

rule {IBar option 3NegPlusAuxVerbRequired - negative Aux then Aux_1 positive, final} I' = VP Aux Aux_1 <I' head> = <VP head> <I' head type auxiliary> = + <Aux_1 head infl polarity> = positive <Aux head infl polarity> = negative <VP head infl polarity> = negative | neg Aux requires neg verb <I' head subject head agr> = <Aux_1 head subject head agr> {<VP head infl finite> = - /<VP head infl finite> = + <Aux_1 head infl tense> = <VP head infl tense> } <VP head type comma> = - <Aux head type comma> = - <I' head type comma> <= <Aux_1 head type comma> <I' head type suffix> <= <Aux_1 head type suffix> <I' option> = 3NegPlusAuxVerbRequired
